column4: hey, i had to reinstall windows on a dualboot machine so grub has been overwritten, how do i reinstall it in the mbr? boot with a livecd and run"grub" or such (like one did for lilo)
will it detect the different os:s or is there some grub.conf in etc for that?
you'll need to edit /boot/grub/menu.lst to tell it to look for the other oses
